report.title: List of locations for mapping pollinators
report.description: Basic list of locations designed for mapping.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l -- Not private LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vp on vp.location_id=l.id and vp.location_attribute_id=257 and vp.deleted=false and vp.int_value=1 -- JBC JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false AND lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND vp.id IS NULL #filters#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

joins.join: JOIN location_attribute_values vchk on vchk.location_id=l.id and vchk.location_attribute_id=256 and vchk.deleted=false and vchk.int_value=1
LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vchk on vchk.location_id=l.id and vchk.location_attribute_id=256 and vchk.deleted=false and vchk.int_value=1
